alert.note: Alert for Monroe (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:29PM EDT until July 18 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MONROE COUNTY... At 1226 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamlin Beach State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Hilton, Hamlin Beach State Park, Charlotte, Morton, and Braddock Bay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: The locations that will be impacted by the strongest part of this storm will be from Hamlin Beach to Charlotte, including Hilton and Braddock Bay. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
